title: Textile, "Judgement of Clara", early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
inscribed: On a pedestal near the center, "Buquet...sculp".
dimensions:
Warp: 82cm (32 1/4in.)
Weft: 80cm (31 1/2in.) (right selvedge only)
Height of repeat: 59cm (23 1/4in.)
description: Four scenes (all captioned in French) of the story of Clara. One scene would only be complete when lengths were sewn together. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Judgement of Clara", early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-162.
